title: Smeagol, Old Noser (P) (0P18)
text:
Set:	Promotional
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Companion
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Ring-bound. To play add a burden. Regroup: Exert Smeagol (or Gollum) twice to reveal the top 4 cards of your draw deck. Wound a minion for each Shadow card revealed. Place those 4 cards beneath your draw deck in any order.
Rarity:	P
